resources.string: The objective of this research is to identify different behavioral insights and test their effect to decrease phone usage.\nThe research helps better understand the role of nudges for the use of modern technology, and find out how users respond to voluntary measures to guide themselves to more responsive phone usage.
- Making the selections in the application when requested

- Research is voluntary.\n- Test subject has right to stop participating the research at any time by uninstalling the application.\n- Test subject has right to inquire more information regarding the research.

- Research data is not personally identifiable.
- All information is anonymized.
- Research date is only used for scientific research purposes.
- Research data is not sold to anyone.

- The research lasts 8 weeks.\n- If the test subject does not uninstall the application, they have right to continue to use the application.\n- The data collection will continue as long as the application has been installed.

Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.

In the coming weeks the app will provide feedback and will encourage you to think about your phone usage.

Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.

In the coming weeks the app will provide feedback and will encourage you to think about your phone usage.

Take the research survey.
Pre-test will invoke automatically in 1 minute, you can come back any time to complete your questionnaire.

Below is a list of smartphone-related behaviors or responses people sometimes have following their smartphone using experiences. Please read each item carefully, and select the option that best describes how much the description fits you during the past 3 months.
Although using smartphone has brought negative effects on my interpersonal relationships, the amount of time spent on Internet remains unreduced.

string-array.name: IntroTexts
string-array.item:
Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.

In the coming weeks the app will provide feedback and will encourage you to think about your phone usage.

Now collecting data in the background.
Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.\n\nThis week the app shows you the statistics of your phone usage every time you unlock your phone.

Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.\n\nThis week the app gives positive emoji for sleep time, unlocks, and screen on time if you have a decreased trend in your phone usage from the last week.
Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.\n\nThis week the app gives positive emoji if you meet the personal goal you have defined to decrease your phone usage.
Deglancer helps you learn about your phone usage.\n\nNow observing your usage in the background.

string-array.name: PreTestQuestions
string-array.item: Although using smartphone has brought negative effects on my interpersonal relationships, the amount of time spent on Internet remains unreduced.
I use smartphone for a longer period of time and spend more money than I had intended.
I try to spend less time on smartphone, but the efforts were in vain.
I feel aches and soreness in the back or eye discomforts due to excessive smartphone use.
I make it a habit to use smartphone and the sleep quality and total sleep time decreased.
To use smartphone has exercised certain negative effects on my schoolwork or job performance.
I feel restless and irritable when the smartphone is unavailable.
I feel uneasy once I stop smartphone for a certain period of time.
I find that I have been hooking on smartphone longer and longer.
I have increased substantial amount of time using smartphone per week in recent 3 months.
